Articles.Content:
It's almost 1 a.m in Mexico City and I think I am about to go to bed. But who else is doing a vigil and refreshing the KSP site or steam every five minutes even at this late hour? I am!

And I guess Squad is too... maybe drinking champagne. I hope they are, because tomorrow we all get an awesome KSP day.
Nope ... past experiences show that it is improbable to expect a release before ~6-8 PM here in germany (i.e. I donÃ‚Â´t expect it before ~11 am in Mexico City)

Refreshing Steam? One does not simply "refresh" a completely automated system like Steam.

(Seriously, it just starts downloading the moment it drops)
8:46 here in switzerland.... no update, gotta get back to work

I admit I'm in the refresh spam crowd. I'm trying to keep it down to no more than once every five minutes out of guilt, but GAH! The impatience!

I may have slightly overdosed on hype over the last two days.
I'm excited too, but have this cloud of "duties" hanging over me this week.
Currently 4 in the morning EDT, still waiting for the server migration. Though I do like how the server migration screen changed.
For me it changed three hours ago and then changed back shortly thereafter xD

Good morning from GMT+1.

Kids dropped off at daycare - Check

Day off from work - Check

Significant Other downtown - Check

KSP 1.0 - Unchecked

Now what do I do?
I expect 1.0 to arrive about 5am in Australia (or earlier). /Observably presses F5 to refresh forum.

luckily (???) for me I work nights.

So hopefully by the time I get back home at around 0730 28/4 New Zealand time [1630 27/4 Rio time] it'll have been released and downloaded...

Refreshing Steam? One does not simply "refresh" a completely automated system like Steam.

(Seriously, it just starts downloading the moment it drops)

Not everyone has Steam. If you have the KSP Store version you'd need to keep any eye on the forum.

Imadgine that it is sunday (you took a day off anyway) and tomorow it will be avaible anyway.

Also, for the next update I expect Squad to move their offices to Tuwalu.

Well, at least the announcement on the home site about server migration has changed from plain ascii to an image, so we're getting nearer and nearer.

I must say after what I've seen in the streams of the past weekend this will really be a milestone release. So a big thumbs up for the developers who made all these changes and additional goodies available that we're all anxious waiting for now.

Greets,

Jan
3:06 AM PST, still in server migration.

3:06 AM PST, still in server migration.

I went to bed yesterday at 23pm. Woke up now (7am) and nothing.

People are saying they see an image on the official KSP site, I only see text.

It would be cool to see a graph showing the number of people downloading the game after it's released.

I'd suspect it would be similar to bacterial growth graph.
2130 here in Australia and still waiting. I half tempted to buy it on steam so I don't miss it.

I went to bed yesterday at 23pm. Woke up now (7am) and nothing.

People are saying they see an image on the official KSP site, I only see text.

Close your browser and then open it and type in the URL. I bet you see te image. It's for direct traffic only, can't refresh or link.

...People are saying they see an image on the official KSP site, I only see text.

Hmm, went back to ascii I'm affraid. Oh well, at least they're doing something over there. LOL

Greets,

Jan

Server Migration

Kerbal Space Program website is in maintenance mode while we are performing a Server Migration.

We appreciate your patience.

- Squad Team

Is this the text everyone is talking about? What gives?
I'm currently on a holiday in China with my wife, and as I type, it's 19:56. I think I'm not getting the new KSP until Wednesday morning... :/
I just got home from work and I estimate I'll have to wait some 6-8 hours for the release.
Guys, listen to me carefully, it will be released around the same time as the Kountdown Riddles used to be released.
I have the benefit of living in the same time zone as Squad. For us its only 7:23am at time of typing. I wont really get uppity about it until around 09:00am our time.
